title: 15-year-old boy in serious condition after New City shooting
content:
A 15-year-old boy is in serious condition after being shot Monday afternoon in the New City neighborhood on the South Side.
He was found outside with a gunshot wound to the abdomen just after 4 p.m. in the 4800 block of South Ada, Chicago Police said.
He was taken to Comer Children’s Hospital in serious condition, police said.
